title: Potential effects of soil petroleum contamination on decomposition of Artemisia annua plant litter
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00096J, Paper
Jiahao Li, Kaixuan Liu, Yuxin Dong, Lingsu Chen, Ziquan Wang, Jinqiang Chen, Xiaoxi Zhang
The accumulation of petroleum contaminants in phytoremediating plants can significantly impact the decomposition of their litter. However, the mechanisms underlying these effects and the potential influence of the contaminant concentration...
